name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dedicated Senior Elixir Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in backend development, specializing in **Elixir** and leveraging **Rust** for high-performance solutions. Proven expertise in **event-driven architecture** and **microservices**, effectively applying **Agile** methodologies and **domain-driven design** to enhance system efficiency. Strong advocate for **test-driven development (TDD)** practices, ensuring robust and maintainable code through continuous testing and refinement. Skilled in using messaging tools such as **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** to facilitate seamless data transfer and communication between services. 

Alongside my primary skills, I also bring proficiency in modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside platforms including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With a solid foundation in enterprise software development, I have successfully led projects that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, backed by significant experience with cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. My commitment to problem-solving and effective communication ensures successful project delivery and collaborative team dynamics.
